Name: Pho - What is it all about?

Content.summary: 'Pho - What is it all about?' - a blog post by Darren Ferguson about Human Interest, Hospitality Recreation written on 18 July 2006
Content.bodyText:
For those of you who have asked what all the Pho posts are about, here is a good introductory guide to Pho for you:
